This bite-sized trivia game is totally irresistible, whether weâ€™re dominating our Facebook friends in classic mode, trouncing strangers in the 12-question challenge mode, or just sneaking in a game on our Apple Watch. With its cute characters, heaps of unlockable achievements, and a massive variety of questions, we simply canâ€™t get enough.

The most ingenious thing about Blackbox's puzzles isnâ€™t that you solve them without tapping or swiping. Itâ€™s that youâ€™ll happily spend hoursÂ figuring outÂ the game'sÂ subtleÂ clues. Do you need to tilt your iPhone, shout into the speaker or something a lot trickier?Â ThinkingÂ creatively and finding the answer feels deeply rewarding, even profoundâ€”earning Blackbox an Apple Design Award.
